entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7.
